features: Compatible Model: This angle mount ONLY compatible with Video Doorbell Wired (2021 release) / Video Doorbell Pro. (Note: Doorbell is Not Included in Package.)

Accurate Degree Scale: This Doorbell angle mount allows adjusting the angle to left or right accurately from 30 degree to 55 degree. You can easily get your desired angle by viewing the exact degree scale and this will save you much time.
Symmetric Design: Each Video Doorbell angle mount is symmetric, and will give a 30 to 55 degree viewing angle towards to the right or left.
High Quality: All parts of this product are well made with top quality ABS material, and all the screw holes are well designed and fit the high quality stainless steel screw perfectly.
Best Customer Service: RIOVO try best to make 100% satisfaction of customers. Best product quality and customer service to ensure customers a wonderful shopping experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was so happy to receive my angled mount! I ordered 2 others that did not come as advertised but THIS ONE DID HER THING! The installation instructions were very straightforward and easy to follow. I got it up in about 10 minutes. I love that it’s more of a heavy aluminum/ metal material and not some flimsy plastic, makes me think it’s very durable but only time will tell. The sizing was a perfect fit and it has a very sleek and pretty appearance that was personally pleasing! Thank you seller for your quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely fits Eufy E340
reviews.reviewText: Easy install with the Eufy back plate on this wedge. Sturdy and secure to hold the video doorbell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As written by other folk, the location of my original doorbell switch faced the opposite wall. Not good. So I gave this RIOVO Adjustable 30 to 55 Degree Doorbell Angle Mount a try. Keep in mind it does have 6 holes for your Ring doorbell (3 at the top, 3 at the bottom) as a type of universal mount, depending on what model you have. The only 'problem' I had was that the 2 holes on the base that screw into the wall did not line up at all with the 2 holes (with already installed anchors from the original switch) that were already in the wall. Rather than drill 2 new holes in the concrete block wall, and then install 2 new anchors, I took the old switch, placed it in the correct position on the base, used a small nail to mark the holes, and drilled 2 new small holes (carefully, it's only plastic) that would line up with the already installed holes/anchors. Had a little trouble pairing the doorbell (not included) with the new ring chime (not included) with Android phone. Had to completely start over at one point. But we just YouTubed it and now everything works GREAT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works beyond Ring Video Doorbells
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my Eufy 2k battery powered video doorbell. I needed a wedge that was bigger then the 15 degree one included in the box. This allows for a 35 to 55 degree degree angle. It works with the mount included with the eufy video doorbell and I suspect would work for any eufy video doorbell. The only draw back is there is a little gap between the eufy mounting piece and the wedge but it is not large and it is not a big deal. If it bothers someone they can seal it in several different ways. Installation was easy and I would recommend this product for anyone needing a larger wedge for a eufy video doorbell without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right angle
reviews.reviewText: This item is just what I needed. The fact that it is fully adjustable with out having to add or take away plates is great. The mounting screws are junk, I would recommend that you used a better quality ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It was an easy install but the bracket is not very sturdy I would have given it 5 stars if it was sturdy
Lo tuve que comprar para una ring doorbell wired y la verdad es muy fácil de instalar. Es ligero y al ser de esquina puedes acomodarla al ángulo que desees.

This product has everything you need to install the wired door camera. It was easy to install and worked just like expected. The camera has a good quality picture and works well with picking up activity around the door. I recommend this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality and made replacing a Ring Pro with a Ring Wired much simpler
reviews.reviewText: My RIng Pro button disintegrated and, as a Ring Wired is so cheap, I decided to go for the easy option and jut buy a new Ring Wired. The Ring Wired is smaller than a Ring Pro, so would've meant drilling new holes in the wall to mount it. However, I noticed this mount had the screw holes in the same place as the Ring Pro, yet would allow you to mount a Ring Wired to it. I also wanted a mount to angle the doorbell away from the wall. So this mount seemed perfect.It was easy to install and did line up with the previous Ring Pro holes. The Ring Wired screwed to the mount easily and some supplied tape covered the exposed parts at the top and bottom of mount and looked better than I thought it would.The quality of the mount is good and seems sturdy and well made. The thing to be aware of it that it would be easier for a thief to steal your doorbell. The Ring doorbells have an anti-tamper screw to hold the cover in place. This mount has no such thing, so you could remove the mount from the wall (along with your doorbell) with a standard screwdriver. Hopefully the button on RIng Wired will last a bit longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Needed to mount ring pro video camera at slight angle this was perfect
